front.title: ICCP extension for the MSP application

abstract.t: This document presents some extensions on the Inter-Chassis Communication Protocol(ICCP) to support the application of multiplex section protection(MSP) that is described in the G.841. Linear multiplex section protection(MSP) is used to protect the Synchronous Digital Hierarchy (SDH) network. In the case of inter-chassis linear MSP, it needs a mechanism to synchronize the state and configuration data between the two chassis. The ICCP is appropriate for that.
